SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "USER" WHERE USERID IN (SELECT USERID FROM "ORDER" WHERE ORDERNO IN (SELECT ORDERNO FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE PRODUCTNO IN (SELECT PRODUCTNO FROM PRODUCT WHERE SELLERID = #{sellerId}))) AND USERGENDER = 'F'

SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM') AS MONTH, NVL(SUM(a.REVENUE), 0) REVENUE FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(PAYDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAYDATE, SUM(DETAILPRICE) AS REVENUE FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE PRODUCTNO IN (SELECT PRODUCTNO FROM PRODUCT WHERE SELLERID = #{selectId}) GROUP BY PAYDATE ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE('2021-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.PAYDATE(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'MM')
